title: FOOTBALL MANAGER 2008 with crack and graphics (photos)
description:
Works fine. Use DAEMON or ALCOHOL with .mds file and after install, copy the crack file from the other archive into football manager\&#039;s directory  

Unrar the graphics archive into C:\\Documents and Settings\\...\\My Documents\\Sports Interactive\\Football Manager 2008, and in the game go to preferences, unmark \&#039;use skin cache\&#039; and mark \&#039;always reload skin after confirm\&#039;
